key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities including semiconductor shortages and battery supply constraints
Dependence on strategic partners Geely Holding and Volvo Cars
Intense competition in the premium EV market
Profitability concerns due to lack of consistent financial performance
Environmental scrutiny over battery production and supply chain practices
controversies: Criticism over environmental impact of battery production
environmental_issues: Environmental impact of battery production and supply chain practices
social_issues: Reliance on Chinese manufacturing facilities with potential labor practice risks
governance_issues: Dependence on external finance providers for customer financing
